name: 悪意 - Akui
description:
Akui is a mystery/horror short, that plays in the D.O.A.S. universe.
https://gamesbybass.itch.io/doas
https://gamesbybass.itch.io/doas-addon

Akui was planned as a teaser for a bigger project. - Thank you Captain Obvious. - Unfortunately this year fu**ed everything up, so I decided to make a stand-alone out of it. I just did not want to throw the result away. Hopefully I can make a full release sometime.


You can find some references in this short:

Doppelganger
Is also used in D.O.A.S. as a description of a person caught in the parallel dimension

Heather
Well known from Silent Hill

Bills last Will
Of course a Tarantino reference

The Club Rose
A well known symbol is the rose from the Dark Tower series by Stephen King
